name: GetUserCoupons
description: Get the coupons for a specific user

properties.name: IsUsable
properties.description: Filter on usability. Optional values are; null = all coupons, true = usable only, false = unusable only.

properties.name: OrganizationUnitID
properties.description: You can provide an additional `OrganizationUnitID` to filter the coupons. This only works when you are logged in as User. Employees/API's can only see coupons that are within the ClientContext CurrentOrganizationUnit
